ITexture.h

This file defines the published interface for textures.

ITexture

Defines how clients interact with textures

Header

Rendering/Caustic/ITexture.h

Functions

virtual uint32 GetWidth() = 0
Returns

Returns the width of the texture in pixels

Returns

Returns the height of the texture in pixels

virtual DXGI_FORMAT GetFormat() = 0
Returns

Returns the pixel format of the texture

virtual void Update(
IRenderer *pRenderer
) = 0

Updates the underlying graphics card texture. Primarily used for video textures.

graphics device

Returns

Returns the underlying D3D shader resource view associated with the texture

IRenderer *pRenderer,
int slot,
bool isPixelShader
) = 0

Pushes the specified texture to the GPU

Returns

CreateTexture
CAUSTICAPI CRefObj<ITexture> CreateTexture(
IRenderer *pRenderer,
IImage *pImage,
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG cpuFlags,
D3D11_BIND_FLAG bindFlags
)

Creates a texture from an <IImage at Caustic::IImage>.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Renderer

pImage
IImage*

image to use

cpuFlags
D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_FLAG

Flags indicating allowed access to texture from CPU (see D3D11 documentation)

bindFlags
D3D11_BIND_FLAG

bind flags (see D3D11 documentation)

Returns

Returns the created texture
